eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Informed Consent
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects must have signed and dated an IRB/IEC approved written informed consent form in accordance with regulatory and institutional guidelines.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Compliance
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects must be willing and able to comply with scheduled visits, treatment schedule, laboratory testing, and other requirements of the study.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Advanced HCC Status
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects with advanced hepatocellular carcinoma: i) disease not eligible for curative surgical and/or locoregional therapies, OR ii) progressive disease after surgical and /or locoregional therapies. Note: Surgical and/or locoregional therapy to reduce overall tumor burden prior to study entry is not allowed.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: No Prior Systemic Therapy
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: No prior systemic therapy for hepatocellular carcinoma

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Histologic Confirmation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Histologic confirmation of hepatocellular carcinoma. Subjects with only a radiologic diagnosis of HCC may be enrolled for screening in the study but histological confirmation is mandatory prior to the start of study therapy. Tumor tissue must be received by the central vendor.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Measurable Disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: At least one RECIST 1.1 measurable untreated lesion. All subjects must have at least one previously untreated, unidimensionally measurable lesion by contrast-enhanced spiral computed tomography (CT) >=10 mm or contrast enhanced dynamic magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scan >=10 mm.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Locoregional Therapy Recovery
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: For subjects who progressed after locoregional therapy, the locoregional procedure must have been completed at least 4 weeks prior to the baseline scan. In addition, all acute toxic effects of the locoregional procedure must have resolved to NCI CTCAE version 4.0 Grade <=1.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Child-Pugh Class A
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Cirrhotic status of Child-Pugh Class A

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: ECOG Performance Status
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status (PS) 0 or 1.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Viral Status Eligibility
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects are eligible to enroll if they have non-viral-HCC, or if they have HBV-HCC (Resolved or Chronic with DNA < 100 IU/mL and on antiviral therapy), or HCV-HCC (Active or resolved).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Laboratory Values
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Screening laboratory values must meet criteria: WBC >=2000/uL, Neutrophils >=1500/uL, Platelets >=60 x 10^3/uL, Hemoglobin >=8.5 g/dL, PT-INR <=2.3, Albumin >=2.8 g/dL, Bilirubin <=3 mg/dl, AST/ALT <=5x ULN, Creatinine < 1.5x ULN or CrCl > 50 mL/min.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Cardiac Function
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Adequate cardiac function with a left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) > 50% as measured by 2-D echocardiography

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Age Requirement
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Males and Females, ages >=18 years of age

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: HCC Variants Exclusion
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Known fibrolamellar HCC, sarcomatoid HCC, or mixed cholangiocarcinoma and HCC

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Liver Transplant Exclusion
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Prior liver transplant

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hepatic Encephalopathy
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of hepatic encephalopathy

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Significant Ascites
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Clinically significant ascites as defined by: i) Any ascites by physical examination at screening or ii) Prior ascites that required treatment and require on-going prophylaxis OR current ascites requiring treatment

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Portal Hypertension
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Evidence of portal hypertension with bleeding esophageal or gastric varices within the past 6 months

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Brain Metastases
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Active brain metastases or leptomeningeal metastases. Treated brain metastases are eligible if stable for 4 weeks and no steroid requirement > 10mg prednisone.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Viral Co-infections
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Active co-infection with: (1) Both hepatitis B and C, OR (2) Hepatitis D infection in subjects with hepatitis B; or history of coinfection as defined in protocol.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: HIV/AIDS
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Known history of testing positive for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) or known acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS)

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Autoimmune Disease
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Subjects with any active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease, with specific exceptions for vitiligo, type 1 diabetes, resolved childhood asthma, or euthyroid autoimmune thyroid disorders.
